RestWorkflowContext Output Functionalities

RWC

Overview

Welcome to our RestWorkflowContext Output Functionalities App Designed for data scientists and developers, we empower you to make informed decisions and optimize operations by accurately predicting future outcomes using the most optimized models available.

Key Features

    +
  • Output String: The ability to output a string message using the outStr method.
    • +
  • Output Pandas DataFrame: The ability to output a Pandas DataFrame using the outPandasDataframe method.
    • +
  • Output HTML: The ability to output HTML content using the outHTML method.
    • +
  • Output Plotly: The ability to output a Plotly chart using the outPlotly method.
    • +
  • Output Progress: The ability to output a progress bar using the outputProgress method.
    • +
  • Output Message: The ability to output an execution status message using the outSuccess method.

{"components":[{"label":"Columns","columns":[{"components":[{"label":"HTML","attrs":[{"attr":"","value":""}],"content":"

Execution of RestWorkflowContext Output Functionalities

Overview

  •    In this stage, we execute the RestWorkflowContext output functionalities, including output string, Pandas DataFrame, HTML, Plotly, progress, and success message.

Key Execution Steps:

  •    Output String: Execute the outStr method to output a string message.
  •    Output Pandas DataFrame: Execute the outPandasDataframe method to output a Pandas DataFrame.
  •    Output HTML: Execute the outHTML method to output HTML content.
  •    Output Plotly: Execute the outPlotly method to output a Plotly chart.
  •    Output Progress: Execute the outputProgress method to output a progress bar.
  •    Output Success Message: Execute the outSuccess method to output a success message.
